sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import { useProductContext } from '../../context/product-context' import { url } from '../../utils/utils' import Stars from '../Stars/Stars' import {FaArrowCircleRight,FaClock,FaUserShield} from 'react-icons/fa' const SingleProductPage = () => { const {fetchgivenproduct,single_product, //product name product_name, product_tags, labelfor_1080p, pricefor_1080p, currencycode_1080p, currencysymbol_1080p, currencyformat_1080p, oldprice_1080p, oldprice_currencycode_1080p, oldprice_currencysymbol_1080p, oldprice_currencyformat_1080p, labelfor_4k, pricefor_4k, currencycode_4k, currencysymbol_4k, currencyformat_4k, oldprice_4k, oldprice_currencycode_4k, oldprice_currencysymbol_4k, oldprice_currencyformat_4k, //for battery_accessories labelfor_battery_accessory, pricefor_battery_accessory, currencycode_battery_accessory, currencysymbol_battery_accessory, currencyformat_battery_accessory, oldprice_battery_accessory, oldprice_currencycode_battery_accessory, oldprice_currencysymbol_battery_accessory, oldprice_currencyformat_battery_accessory, //for shipping get_shipping, shipping_props, ready_to_ship, in_stock, fast_dispatch, //shipping method shipping_country, shipping_title, shippingtime_leadvalue, shippingtime_info, //shipping cost shipping_cost_value, shipping_currencycode, shipping_currencysymbol, shipping_currencyformat, //quantity quantity_for_1080p, quantity_for_4k, quantity_for_battery, //totalprice total_price, //discount,review and count get_discount, discount_amount, discount_end_date, get_review, get_review_count, get_rating, get_total_buyers, productimage } = useProductContext() useEffect(() => { fetchgivenproduct(`${url}`) }, [url]) //console.log(single_product); const [for1080p,Setfor1080p] = useState(quantity_for_1080p) const [for4k,Setfor4k] = useState('') const [forbattery,Setforbattery] = useState('') const incrementhandlerfor1080p = () =>{ Setfor1080p(for1080p+1) } return (

{ready_to_ship && "Ready To Ship"}

{in_stock && "In Stock"}

{fast_dispatch && "Fast Dispatch"}

This is {product_name} {product_tags}

R 78.50 - R 895.31 / Option 2 Options(Min.Order)

March Expo Free shipping (up to $40) On time-delivery guaranteed

{discount_amount} OFF Discount ends in {discount_end_date}

  • {labelfor_1080p} {currencysymbol_1080p} {pricefor_1080p} {for1080p}
  • {labelfor_4k} {currencysymbol_4k} {pricefor_4k} {quantity_for_4k}
  • {labelfor_battery_accessory} {currencysymbol_battery_accessory} {pricefor_battery_accessory} {quantity_for_battery}

Your total price is {shipping_currencysymbol} {for1080p*total_price}

Here comes the option columns

Trade Assurance protects your Alibaba.com orders

Alibaba.com Logistics Inspection Solutions

Ship to {shipping_country} {shipping_title} Total amount is {shipping_currencysymbol} {shipping_cost_value}

Lead time {shippingtime_leadvalue}

Shipping time {shippingtime_info}

) } export default SingleProductPage
